scripts.build:wrapper: cd ../../../packages/components && npm i && npm run build:stencil && cd ../components-vue && npm run build
scripts.link-clean-win: cd ../../../packages/components-vue && rmdir /s /q node_modules && npm run build && npm link && cd ../../examples/wrapper-components/vue-javascript && npm link @infineon/infineon-design-system-vue
scripts.link-clean-unix: cd ../../../packages/components-vue && rm -rf node_modules &&  npm run build && npm link && cd ../../examples/wrapper-components/vue-javascript && npm link @infineon/infineon-design-system-vue
